mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_INSBALSHE (INSTITUTIONBSSEQNO, INSTITUTIONBSBSSGMTSEQNO, INSTITUTIONBSSGMTSEQNO) values (#{InstitutionBSSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InstitutionBSBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InstitutionBSSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select INSTITUTIONBSSEQNO, INSTITUTIONBSBSSGMTSEQNO, INSTITUTIONBSSGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_INSBALSHE where INSTITUTIONBSSEQNO = #{InstitutionBSSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select INSTITUTIONBSSEQNO, INSTITUTIONBSBSSGMTSEQNO, INSTITUTIONBSSGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_INSBALSHE
